revised_title: Essays on Science: A Tribute to Joseph Needham and the Diffusion of Knowledge
tldr: This book review discusses a collection of essays honoring Joseph Needham's work, focusing on the exchange of scientific knowledge between China, India, and Europe from the 15th to the 18th centuries. The volume covers various topics, including Chinese astronomy, medicine, textile history, and rocket technology, as well as Indian materialist science and the Japanese style of management. The essays highlight the impact of Asian scientific contributions on Europe and the internationalization of science.
